details: Contributed to the migration of the in-house product customizer from jQuery to React.
Improved the render performance of the canvas-based in-house product customizer by 90%.
Led a team of 4 front-end developers, providing mentorship and technical guidance.
Collaborated with product stakeholders to define product roadmaps, prioritize tasks, plan releases, and manage the product backlog.
Led the progressive migration of the application from AngularJS/Vue to a React SSR architecture using Next.js.
Implemented improved internationalization (i18n) management using Lokalize.
Improved website performance from a Lighthouse score of 'F' to 'A'.
Reduced website carbon footprint by 75%, from 2g CO2/page to 0.5g CO2/page.
Decreased website load time by over 70%, from 10 seconds to under 3 seconds.
Led a team of 3 front-end developers, providing mentorship and technical guidance.
Led the migration of the React Progressive Web App (PWA) to TypeScript, improving code quality and maintainability through the implementation of CI/CD pipelines.
Developed a custom solution for implementing a micro-frontend architecture.
Developed a custom solution for a multi-technology micro-frontends architecture using React and Angular.
Collaborated into the development and bug fixing of banking and public administration applications.
